ai-tha-ap39:1.2_0: I am the one who understands
ai-tha-ap39:1.4_0: My hair was as sweet as a jujube.
ai-tha-ap39:2.2_0: I have come to the Saṅgha
ai-tha-ap39:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap39:3.1_0: he’s not seeing the peak of nature,
ai-tha-ap39:3.2_0: in the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap39:3.3_0: the Community, having given a garments to the Sangha,
ai-tha-ap39:3.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap39:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap39:4.4_0: this is the garden of the fruit.
ai-tha-ap39:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa.
